greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways to represent the n-th prime as arithmetic mean of three odd primes.
program: z ps'@(p:ps) i m = if m < p then 0 else z ps' (i+1) (m - p) + z ps i m
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 03 2002
ext: Definition, initial term and example corrected. Thanks to _Zak Seidov_, who found the mistake. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 24 2015
